Description: City Hall Area / Winter Hill / Gilman Square - In a 12-unit Victorian house. Large rooms. Hardwood floors. Oval-shaped foyer. Small study room. Eat-in kitchen with updated cabinets, dishwasher and disposer. Coin-operated laundry and storage bin in basement. Only 1 block to the new Gilman Square Green Line subway station. Smoking and pets are not allowed. Heat and hot water included in rent.
